author: @GbaseGear
title: Suhr Eddie's Guitars Exclusive Modern - Purple Rain > Guitars Electric Solid Body | Eddie's Guitars
text: This Suhr Eddie's Guitars Exclusive Modern in Purple Rain is mesmerizing to look at. What a finish! As if that wasn't enough, the astounding looks are just the beginning. Constructed with a alder body, maple neck and ebony fingerboard – it is tonewoods galore. With a versatile HH pickup configuration and Gotoh Floyd for impressive wiggles, it is a modern beast. Order this beauty from Eddie’s Guitars today before this blue beauty gets away! Other specifications include: Alder Body 2-Piece Arm, Hand, & Tummy Contours Satin Neck Finish Maple Neck Ebony Fingerboard Even C Slim .800 - .880" 10-14" Radius Standard Roll 1.650" width Floyd Nut Stainless Steel, Jumbo 24 Frets Black Hardware Gotoh Floyd Bridge Suhr Locking Tuners Aldrich, Black neck position Aldrich, Black bridge position 1 Volume, 1 Tone, 5-Way Blade Decal Logo Mother of Pearl Side & Ring Face Face Dots Hard Case 7 lbs 13 oz For more information about the Suhr Modern, please contact us. All Major Credit Cards, Money Order, Cashiers Check, Personal Check, Wire Transfer, and Paypal Call for details. Call for details.
